patthana16.16:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:1.1_1: Kusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:1.1_2: Kusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:1.1_3: Kusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacitto ca naabyākato nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:1.1_4: Kusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto ca naakusalo nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.16:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:2.1_1: Akusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:2.1_2: Akusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:2.1_3: Akusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto ca naabyākato nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:2.1_4: Akusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto ca naakusalo nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.16:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:3.1_1: Abyākataṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:3.1_2: Abyākataṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto ca naakusalo nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.16:4.1_0: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.16:5.1_0: Kusalaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:5.1_1: Kusalaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:5.1_2: Kusalaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nanocitto ca naabyākato nanocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.16:6.1_0: Akusalaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:6.1_1: Akusalaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:6.1_2: Akusalaṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocitto ca naabyākato nanocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.16:8.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
